description: '''Whitehouse''' were an English [[noise music]] band formed in 1980. The group is largely credited for the founding of the [[Power electronics (music)|power electronics genre]]. Whitehouse was founded and ended as a duo consisting of electronics player [[Philip Best]] and vocalist William Bennett, however the group is perhaps bestâ€“recognized for their 20-year-tenure as a three-piece with synthist [[Peter Sotos]] as a member, who joined the band in 1983 and left in 2003.
